H0.text: When were the first Winter Paralympics held. 1960

H1.text: When were the first Winter Paralympics held. 1972

H2.text: When were the first Winter Paralympics held. 1980

H3.text: When were the first Winter Paralympics held. 1976

A4.text: The first Winter Paralympics were held in 1976 at Örnsköldsvik, Sweden from February 21–28.

A5.text: The Winter Paralympics began in 1976 in Örnsköldsvik, Sweden.
